trans-unit.source: An Astropy package for source detection and photometry
trans-unit.target: 用于源检测和光度测量的Astropy软件包。

trans-unit.source: If you use Photutils for a project that leads to a publication, whether directly or as a dependency of another package, please include the following acknowledgment:
trans-unit.target: 如果您在一个项目中使用Photutils,导致了一个出版物,无论是直接或作为其他软件包的依赖,请包括以下感谢。

trans-unit.source: Photutils is an Astropy package for detection and photometry of astronomical sources.
trans-unit.target: Photutils是Astropy软件包，用于天文学来源的检测和光度测量。

trans-unit.source: Photutils is licensed under a 3-clause BSD license. Please see the LICENSE file for details.
trans-unit.target: Photutils拥有3条款BSD许可。有关详细信息，请参见 LICENSE文件。

trans-unit.source: Please see the online documentation for installation instructions and usage information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅在线文档以获取安装说明和使用信息。

trans-unit.source: where (Bradley et al. 20XX) is a citation to the Zenodo record of the Photutils version that was used. We also encourage citations in the main text wherever appropriate. Please see the CITATION file for details and an example BibTeX entry.
trans-unit.target: 其中（Bradley等人20XX）引用了所使用的Photutils版本的Zenodo记录。在适当的情况下，我们也鼓励在正文中引用。有关详细信息和BibTeX条目示例，请参见CITATION文件。
